EmailTemplate.subject: eBook! What are the hottest trends in branch transformation across Europe?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: How consumers are using the branch is changing – they like the convenience of digital and self-service channels and having the flexibility to bank when and how they choose. But what does this mean for branches and the traditional branch formats? Footfall is evolving and conversations are changing. Key to success is rationalizing the physical footprint, and leveraging technology to deliver the experience your customers now expect, and at the same time improve efficiencies and lower the cost-to-serve.
